title: We Spy
description: We Spy - Hi! My name is Brenna Pike. I am fifteen years old, and I live with my three siblings-Spike, Goldie, and Jay. We live by ourselves without any parents in an underground hideaway. Most kids would think that it is really cool to do whatever you want, whenever you want, but it isn't, especially since I'm the oldest and have all the responsibilities of handling three other kids. We would be perfectly normal kids except for one small We're spies who work for a secret agency and are constantly running from danger because of another undercover organization-The Raid. It wants only to get rid of anyone working without government supervision. Of course, the government can't know about the kind of work we do. Now that you know all the facts, you have to promise to keep this a secret. Trust me. I know what I'm talking about . . .
author: Hannah Ingram
